name: 线性同余方程
complexity: O(log min(a, n)) for solving a single equation using extended Euclidean algorithm.
scenarios: Solving equations of the form a*x ≡ b (mod n).
Used in modular arithmetic problems, number theory, and cryptography.
Often a sub-step in Chinese Remainder Theorem.
extensions: System of linear congruences (Chinese Remainder Theorem).
Congruences with composite modulus where a and n are not coprime.
